title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 7-2.20 - Hazardous materials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 7-2.20 - Hazardous materials

State Regulations

Agricultural, commercial or household pesticides and toxic chemicals shall be stored and/or used to cause no air, surface water or ground water pollution or be hazardous to the occupants of the camp. They shall be stored in their original containers in areas designated for such use. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
7-2.20

Amended

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
